description: Director Bård Breien, Actor Svein André Hofsø, and Producers Asle Vatn and Pål Røed LIVE in attendance!
synopsis: What makes Robert a unique P.I. isn't that he has Down Syndrome; it's that he uses empathy to solve his cases. And empathy will come in handy as he investigates a complicated, conspiracy-laden disappearance.
title: Detective Downs
